website_summaries.verdict: A versatile tool that actually looks like a credit card and gives you easy access to some of the most common household tools.
pros: Contains 13 tools, including a letter opener, scissors, ruler, and tweezers
Several items detach from case for easier use
Lightweight and fits comfortably in most wallets
cons: The plastic case isn't as sturdy as it could be and may crack

customer_reviews.title: Cute as a gift, but not something I think has great utility
customer_reviews.text: It comes nicely packaged and would make a nice corporate gift. However, I bought it for a specific purpose and do not think it will work out. I am a nurse and wanted a small knife I can use to open blister packs of medicine. The blade in this is not strong and sharp like my Swiss Army knife blades. It is more like a letter opener, which, to be fair, is how they sometimes advertise it. I thought the light could be used to examine eyes, but it is not as bright as my penlight. The magnifier is of decent quality for one its size. The little pen is handy when you can't find a pen.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Swisscard Lite and small Swiss Army Rambler knife to compare which one is better. Even if the card has more functions not all of them are useful. For example the screw drivers are hard to use in some situations. Also the scissors are harder to operate with only one proper ending. And it leaks some oil inside the card. Led light can be userful. So in general it is not bad but at the end of the day I would prefer standard knife.
customer_reviews.author: Ondrej Svoboda

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I love this card multi tool and will definitely get another. I keep it with me all the time in my business cards. All the tools worked flawlessly and it is so compact, it is barely noticeable. The description calls the blade a "knife/letter opener", but it is just a quality Victorinox knife blade. Excellent design and super useful. I am looking now for replacement pens (just in case).

customer_reviews.title: Handy small tool.

customer_reviews.title: Very usefull.

The magnifying glass is usefull, even though it's tiny. I took off one star because the knife isn't full tang (not sure what victorinox was thinking when they made that). I'll add more to this when I try the pen, stick pin, tweezers, and screw driver thing.

customer_reviews.title: best, lightweight multi-tool out there

In my opinion this is the best, lightweight multi-tool out there.

customer_reviews.author: Busterwolf3

customer_reviews.title: Super Handy
customer_reviews.text: Love the Swisscard - make great stocking stuffers. I always keep one in my purse and find it very handy. Amazing how often I need scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Lore

customer_reviews.title: very nice and practic
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that the scissors are a reasonably big size, enough to be useful. The only thing I don't love on this tool is that it is possible (not easy but possible) to accidentally turn on the light on while it is riding in your bag (it has happened only once to me), and the battery can drain if you don't notice soon.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Lite is Great.
customer_reviews.text: I think the lite version is better than the original version. You get a flashlight which is extra useful in the dark, and an interesting screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: TheBuy3r

customer_reviews.title: Go Go Gadget
customer_reviews.text: Brother in law christmas gift. He loves any type of gadgety gift. This is very useful and easy to slip in a pocket. He keeps it in his according to my sister and loves having the tools handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swisscard Lite Pocket Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest tool, I had the older version which I lost and now this comes out with a flashlight. I carry it with me in my purse and transfer it to my XC ski pack when skiing. Also bought this new one for my daughter who had her old one confiscated when traveling by air - be sure you don't pack it in your "carry-on" luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great little pocket tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my brother. It is a great multi-tool to have. Just don't forget about it if you are going to the airport...I've heard stories of people having to hand it over because they accidentally forgot about it... It seems like a very sturdy product, and the light and magnify glass are very handy to have.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This is the most useful thing in existence
customer_reviews.text: This is the most useful thing in existence! I have now used every tool that this has came with, and I use them often. It is more than thin enough for me to not notice it in my wallet. BUY! BUY! BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and tiny to carry everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool, easy to keep on you. Have you ever been on vacation and wish you brought a little pair of scissors or some other gadget, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Prima Donna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little Gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful little item, has everything you may need in a quick hurry, light, scizzor, knife, screwdriver magnifier even a toothpick and it's so slim it fits in your shirt pocket pocket like a credit card Very imaginative, practical and makes for a wonderful gift for men and women the only think missing is a mirror and needle/thread Wish it were advertized and carried by more stores. Originally I bought mine at Target but when I went there this time they knew nothing about it. Glad I found it tho
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Ehrreich

customer_reviews.title: I've always loved Swiss army knives
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Swiss army knives, but I didn't know if I would like this credit card size version. It turns out, I love it. It fits neatly against my wallet in my pocket and contains more instruments than the small knives, and I use them all. I did, however, change out the tweezers for a small toothpick.
customer_reviews.author: Blightie

customer_reviews.title: thicker than I expected but handy
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has used his enough to convince me to have one. I haven't had the pleasure of needing anything yet but I do love knowing that when I do, I have it. It's thicker than I thought, though, in my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: 0xyjen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter and it was a big hit--except the light switch was On when we received it. Obviously the battery was dead but I found one easily. Glad that was all that was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Wildthyme

customer_reviews.title: Great idea from the best knive maker on the planet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to have instead of a Swiss Army Knife. She loves it and uses it like a pro.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Barry

product_meta.title: Victorinox Swisscard Lite Pocket Tool
product_meta.description: Victorinox is enhances its already popular Swisscard Lite with a new LED mini white light. This versatile multi-tool is the size of a credit card with features that would put a gold card to shame. Includes 13 features: LED mini light, magnifying glass, letter opener/blade, scissors, straight pin, nail file, two screwdrivers, tweezers, toothpick, ball point pen, ruler in inches and a ruler in centimeters. 3.25 in. closed length.
feature_bullets: A CUT ABOVE THE REST: World's First Flat Multi Tool that fits in your wallet with credit cards. Compact, agile and ready to face any adventure head-on. Our range of accessories continue to be an icon of utility and smart design.

DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Limitless possibilities are made simple and streamlined with this colorful take-anywhere companion. Renown Swiss made stainless steel tool construction with a strong and elegant case.

FIT FOR ALL TASKS: Known for their uncompromising style and performance, the Swisscard showcases innovation, dependability and a unique, convenient style that has garnered awards and recognition worldwide.
TRUSTED QUALITY: Made in Switzerland; Victorinox provides a lifetime guarantee against defects in the implements and a 2 year warranty on the case. No assembly required, money back guarantee.
PRODUCT DETAILS: Height: 0.2 in, Length: 3.2 in., Weight: 0.9 oz., Scale Material: ABS/Cellidor
New LED mini white light; 18,000 MCD
Reddot design award winner 2004 for design quality, innovation in form and function
13 tools include: Letter opener/blade, scissors, rulers, tweezers
Special features include magnifying glass, straight pin, pressurized ball point pen and Phillips screwdrivers
Precision crafted in Swtizerland; lifetime warranty

COMPACT CARRY: Bring this tool with you on your daily adventures without sacrificing space. It makes a great gift for any occasion or stocking stuffer for Christmas. The SwissCard will make you question everything you know about multi-tools.

FUNCTIONS: emergency blade (letter opener), scissors, magnifying glass, ,screwdriver 3 mm, screwdriver 5 mm, Phillips screwdriver 00/0, Phillips screwdriver 1/2, tweezers, pressurized ballpoint pen pin, stainless steel, LED, ruler (cm), ruler (inches)
